name: ITSA/LBR Jersey 2.0
description:
$100 MSRP

*  This item is for pre-order, order by Sept. 16th to get in on the first batch  *

ITSA Bike Shop/Little Black Robot Racing Jersey manufactured by Hincapie Sportswear.

Don't let its classic appearance fool you, this jersey features a slim athletic fit for the competitive cyclist.  Looking for a relaxed fit, feel free to order any size larger as they go all the way up to a 6XL.

Technical Features:

*Smart Dry fabric is lightweight and breathable.
*Sun Smart fibers provide 30+ UPF, blocking UVA and UVB.
*Comfort collar, full-length hidden-zipper
*Hincapie Gel-Gripper elastic waist
*3 Back Pockets

Product will arrive approximately 2 months after we have reached minimums.  Only local pickup available at this time.  Please contact us for further details.

Technical Features:
